input_text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to impress the headmaster (sims 2)?
input_text.Response A:
Sure! Here are some tips on how to impress the headmaster in SIMS 2:

1. Make sure you have a good reputation with the other students. This will make it easier for you to get the attention of the headmaster.

2. Do well in all of your classes. This will show the headmaster that you are a good student who is interested in learning.

3. Be active in the school's social life. This will make the headmaster see that you are a well-rounded student who is not just focused on academics.

4. Do something that will make the headmaster proud. This could be something like helping out with a community project or being a good role model for other students.

5. Be respectful of the headmaster and the other students. This will show that you are a mature and well-mannered student.

6. Keep in mind that impressing the headmaster is not something that will happen overnight. It will take time and effort to see results, so don't get discouraged if you don't see results right away.
input_text.Response B: Sure! There are several different ways to do this, but the best one is to complete all of the school activities that he assigns to you. These are things like getting good grades, excelling at sports, and participating in extracurricular activities. Completing these tasks will earn you the respect of the headmaster, and help you to be successful in school.

label_annotations.feedback: I'm not familiar with Sims 2, but from googling, I believe that both responses contain unhelpful, fictitious tips.
